name: SurgicalSiteInfectionDisordersICD10CM
title: Surgical Site Infection (Disorders) (ICD10CM)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has Surgical Site Infection regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: Surgical Site Infection. Including sequelae and subsequent encounter codes to include infections that occur "within 30 days of a surgical procedure.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
